title: Hon Media SD
description: Hon Media SD is a static site created using GatsbyJS and React.js and styled with Tailwind CSS to highlight the services offered by an independent consulting company.

title: Take Care
description: Take Care is a full-stack mobile LAMP application with CRUD functionality that allows users to track their goals and productivity.

title: Worlds Memory Match
description: Worlds Memory Match is a dynamic matching card game themed after one of my favorite EDM artists, Porter Robinson.

title: XuYuan (許願) Shop.
description: XuYuan (許願, pronounced xu3 yuan4) Shop. is a full-stack LAMP eCommerce shopping application.

title: LimitList
description: LimitList is a simple front-end CMS app written using React.js functional components and hooks.
